r.s: Provides a wrapper to the Image Magick Library.
r.d: It's a native php-extension. See http://pear.php.net/manual/en/pecl.imagick.php for installation and usage notes
r.n: - Make it compatible with ImageMagick 5.4.5 (and this is also the needed version now) - adjust package.xml to the new "pear build" command
